actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Devils Sight
special_abilities.desc: The lemures darkvision penetrates magical darkness.

special_abilities.name: Eerie Groan
special_abilities.desc: While the lemure can see a non-devil within 100 feet, it emits a groan that is audible within 300 feet.

special_abilities.name: Lawful Evil
special_abilities.desc: The lemure radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.
